Name: May God Forgive Us
About the game: Stealthily navigate this tense survival horror by managing scarce resources, solving puzzles and when all else fails, fighting to escape the nightmare you've woken up too in the laboratory as you are hunted by the 419 subjects and clean up security teams following the plant explosion. Firearms, combination puzzles, word puzzles, world exploration, Inventory systems with combining and slot options (keyboard 1-4 quick selection inventory slots), multi-character combat large map and different environments, save options, auto save, full gamepad and keyboard automatic sensed options, full sound and graphics options
